languages.text: "Видел несколько ваших полотен, Леди-Навигатор. Это какой-то хитрый шифр? Готов поклясться, в тех мазках нет никакого смысла".
"I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."
languages.original_text: "Видел несколько ваших полотен, Леди-Навигатор. Это какой-то хитрый шифр? Готов поклясться, в тех мазках нет никакого смысла".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."
"I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."
"I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."
"I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."
"I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

languages.text: 「レディ・ナヴィゲイター、あなたの絵を何点か拝見しました。あれは巧妙な暗号か何かですか？どう見ても、あの乱れた筆跡にまったく意味を感じられませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ナヴィゲイター、あなたの絵を何点か拝見しました。あれは巧妙な暗号か何かですか？どう見ても、あの乱れた筆跡にまったく意味を感じられませんでした」

languages.text: "Ich habe einige Eurer Gemälde gesehen, Lady Navigator. Ist das ein raffinierter Code? Ich könnte schwören, dass dieses Chaos von Pinselstrichen keinerlei Bedeutung in sich trägt."
languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einige Eurer Gemälde gesehen, Lady Navigator. Ist das ein raffinierter Code? Ich könnte schwören, dass dieses Chaos von Pinselstrichen keinerlei Bedeutung in sich trägt."

languages.text: « J'ai eu l'occasion de voir quelques-uns de vos tableaux, dame navigatrice. Cacheraient-ils une sorte de code ? Autrement, je ne parviens à discerner aucune signification dans ces enchevêtrements de coups de pinceau. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai eu l'occasion de voir quelques-uns de vos tableaux, dame navigatrice. Cacheraient-ils une sorte de code ? Autrement, je ne parviens à discerner aucune signification dans ces enchevêtrements de coups de pinceau. »

languages.text: «He visto algunos de sus cuadros, lady navegante. ¿Encierran algún tipo de código ingenioso? No logro atribuir ningún significado al caótico trazo de su pincel».
languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

traits.locale_text: «He visto algunos de sus cuadros, lady navegante. ¿Encierran algún tipo de código ingenioso? No logro atribuir ningún significado al caótico trazo de su pincel».

languages.text: “我看过你画的画，导航者女士。这是某种非常高级的密码吗？因为可以这么说，那些乱七八糟的笔触完全没有任何意义。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

traits.locale_text: “我看过你画的画，导航者女士。这是某种非常高级的密码吗？因为可以这么说，那些乱七八糟的笔触完全没有任何意义。”

languages.text: "Birkaç resmini gördüm Leydi Rotacı. Ne onlar öyle, gizli mesaj mı yoksa? O fırça darbelerinden bir şey anladıysam ne olayım."
languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."

traits.locale_text: "Birkaç resmini gördüm Leydi Rotacı. Ne onlar öyle, gizli mesajlı filan mı? O fırça darbelerinden bir şey anladıysam ne olayım."

languages.original_text: "I have seen a few of your paintings, Lady Navigator. Is it some kind of clever code? I would swear there was no meaning behind that mess of brushstrokes."
